701.question: Do they study frequent user responses to help automate modelling of those?

3-Figure2-1.png: Yes, they study frequent user responses to help automate the modeling of those.

703.question: Do they use the same distance metric for both the SimCluster and K-means algorithm?

6-Table1-1.png: Yes, both SimCluster and K-means algorithms use the same distance metric for clustering.
